Well, beyond the fact that it is fast, lightweight and ultra capable on all sorts of terrain, it's just damned good lookin'. Short-travel trail bike? "Downcountry" rig? Occasional race bike? title: Scott Spark 910 (Large Carbon Frame)
text: Selling my much loved Scott Spark 910 (Large)The bike has some upgrades, and has been meticulously maintained by myself, and Knipe Racing over the time I've owned the bike.I've serviced all the rear pivots and packed the bearings with fresh grease, checked and regreased the crankset, bled the brakes, installed a new 180 rotor and fresh pads on the rear, and serviced the headset in December 2022.Bike was washed after every 2nd short ride or after every long ride. Stanchions where cleaned and oiled before/after every ride (First Line Stanchion Lube or Brunox Deo).Please note: I'm keeping the Aassegai front tyre in the pictures, and have installed a Forekaster with fresh sealant (lighter and rolls faster).Reason for selling: I downgraded to an aluminium short travel trail bike.Specs:HMF Carbon Frame (Large) with Aluminium Rear Triangle.Fox 34 Performance Elite (120mm Travel) Air Fork with Remote Lockout (Scott Twin Lock).Fox Nude E-Vol Rear Shock with Remote Lockout (Scott Twin Lock).Shimano XT M8100 12 Speed Rear Derailleur.Shimano XT Brakes with 180mm Rotors front and Rear.Fox Transfer Dropper Seat PostSyncros Carbon Reinforced SeatSyncros Handlebar (760mm Wide)Syncros StemMaxxis Tyres front and rear (good condition).Upgraded/Aftermarket parts on the bike:Bongrager Kovee TLR 28mm OD, 22.5mm ID wheels (Boost front & Rear with Thru-Axle, nice sounding Microspline Hub)Truvativ Stylo Carbon Dub Crankset (170mm).SRAM Crank boots.Csixx Oval 34T Chainring (installed around 600km back).Csixx Dropper Lever.Csixx Mudguard/Fender.Csixx Stem cap.Spank Dual lock ring grips (need replacing soon).There is some clear frame protection on the frame in key locations as well (Chainstay, Downtube, Cable entry points on Headset area).Recent Maintenance/Work Done:Fork was rebuilt, including stanchions and steerer tube pushed out of CSU, cleaned and reassembled with loctite type product, this included all seals, o-rings, wipers, etc (I.e. Full rebuild) - Knipe Racing (02/02/2023)Rear shock was fully rebuilt (new seal, o-rings, etc) - Knipe Racing (02/02/2023)Brand new inner cables for shifter & Lockout system - Knipe Racing (02/02/2023)True rear wheel + New sealant - Knipe Racing (24/03/2023)New sealant front - 21/04/2023The bike is in great condition and rides like a dream, some regular MTB marks here and there, and a scratch on the top tube (I bought it like that).

title: Mongoose L40 BMX for sale - great condition
text:
Cruise the streets, own the park or rip it up in the neighborhood with your friends on the Legion L40. Elevate your ride on this Mongoose L40 boys BMX. 
Great condition and just had a service - asking 4k (fairly neg.) All it needs is a good clean. Great fun for your kid with all the perks of a professional setup! 
Neg. & must collect.

Features

• Mongoose Hi-Ten BMX frame and fork is comfortable and fits modern BMX geometry; top tube measures 20.5" long

• 25x9t gearing with cassette driver and durable 3-piece tubular cromo 170 mm cranks with sealed mid bottom bracket

• Front alloy caliper front brake and rear U-brake combine with the 360 Degree brake rotor for tangle-free braking and rad bar spins

• Stay in control with the Mongoose 8 3/4" handlebars and the Mongoose top loader 50mm threadless stem

• Light and strong alloy rims add crucial durability without weighing you down

title: Trek Roscoe 24” bicycle as new!
text:
Trek Roscoe 24inch with 8 gears 2023 model 
Less than two months old! 
Retail: 10k retail plus spent R1500 spent extra on it = R11,500.
Selling: R8500.
Disc brakes, absolutely no wear on the tyres. A very smooth ride.  Larger red pedals added bling, a larger, cushioned Romero seat added, wheels puncture proofed - and lower chain frame rubber-wrapped.
Bought in an emergency on the eve of my son’s birthday only to find I was supposed to buy a 26”! It is such a stunning bike I have tears in my eyes! https://www.trekbikes.com/za/en_ZA/bikes/mountain-bikes/kids-mountain-bikes/roscoe-kids/roscoe-24/p/33491/?colorCode=bluelight  Roscoe 24 is a kids' mountain bike designed to build confidence on the trail. It takes cues from the adult Roscoe, but this ride was built from the ground up for kids. 2.8˝ mid-fat tyres, a 1x drivetrain and a wide-range cassette make Roscoe the ideal bike for little rippers who want to build skills and have a ridiculous amount of fun keeping up with Mum, Dad or an older sibling. Fit for riders 4’3” - 4’11” (129.5 -150 cm) tall.
Collection constantia or can drop in central Cape Town. Whatsapp Claire 0760118734. Instant efts preferred, or cash.

title: ELECTRIC BIKE CONVERSIONS | E-BIKE KITS | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC
text:
Electric bikes built in SA . We personalize e-bikes for people by focusing on one's desired riding experience. E-bikes individually built to satisfy different forms of adventure or exercise. Custom-built E-bikes designed for Farm roads,beaches,sand dunes, mountains or road. And the conversion of existing bicycles to electric to ensure the perfect combination of comfort and power to optimize your riding performance.
Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.
E-bikes built one at a time to ensure each person's individual needs are met for :
1. Type of terrain.
2. Torque.
3. Speed.
4. Range.
5. Frame size.
6. Weight.
7. Riding preferences .
Specialized e-bikes built for different types of exploration and performance - Fishing adventures, coastal beach riding, mountains and river beds, farm jeep tracks, forest trails , downhill , single tracks . Whether it's a hardtail or soft tail full susp our team custom-builds e-bikes for people's specific needs.We 1st find out what'll suit you best:

Your weight ( for right e-bike motor system)
Your height ( right frame size )
Your own individual riding preferences for comfort ( saddle, handlebars , stem , pedals ) and convenience (carriers,bags,gear/accessories)


WHAT WE LEARNT AFTER 15 YEARS OF CONVERTING BICYCLES TO ELECTRIC:
1. SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :

You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.
Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?
Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.


2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATION

Your bicycle professionally converted to electric by a team who has over 10 years experience in electric bike building over 30 years in bicycle building and servicing .
In 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued using our quality Int'l EU standard motor + battery systems .


3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITY

Choices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.
Careful consideration of your weight, height, terrain and riding preferences and with our guidance you get to choose right from the start the power and range that best suits you.
A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.


4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICE

S.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.
We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintainand service your e-bike.
Your e-bike is compatible with most batteries and bicyle components in the market and therefore when it comes to the time when you need to replace anything you have a wider choice.
100% Satisfaction & Money Back Guarantee

text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. title: ADO A20F XE Fat Tire E-bike - 250W Foldable
text:
ADO 20F XE electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system - The latest XE model
Shimano 7-speed TransmissionADO 20F XE  electric bike is designed for customers with 3 different riding modes, and with Shimano 7-speed shifting system, it can effectively solve the problems customers encounter on hills, snow and other difficult roads. Give customers a smooth sporting experience!
Front fork suspension to overcome rough and bumpy road conditions The front fork is with spring absorber ,which effectively absorbs the ground impact and brings sensitive response and smooth operation to the rider.
20X4.0 Fat TyreFolding electric bike looks much like any other foldable mountain bike, but with some extra style and those 20×4.0 CST fat tires have an attitude.
It combines the best of both foldable bikes and mountain bikes you can get.
Overall size : 1740*530*1200 mm
After folding: 980*450*770 mm
Net Weight: 30kgG-Driver 2.0 Control SystemADO’s updated G-Driver controller is the solution to gear automation. It offers excellent real-time performance and responds seamlessly to user input.


250w Powerful MotorThis 20-inch fat-tire electric bike packs some awesome power in the form of a massive 250-watt rear hub motor that works with a 36V 10.4Ah battery for a maximum speed of 25 miles per hour. The high-speed motor allows you to cross any terrain with ease.

title: Fuzion Cityglide Adult Kick Scooter (Green)
text:
Used Adult scooter. 

CityGlide by NextSport is the premier line of cruising BIG WHEEL Scooters. Great for last mile commuting and perfect for just getting out and having fun! This Scooter is your first choice of transportation on the go. Its lightweight and low-to-the-ground deck structure and oversized polyurethane tires provide a stable smooth ride even on bumpy city side walks. On top of that, the easy folding mechanism allows you to take Cityglide any and everywhere. CityGlide is suitable for ALL AGES but it is the ideal scooter for adults and teens due to its comfortable ride height. Great for college students! SUPPORTS RIDERS up to 220lbs!Foldable, and with big 200mm Wheels, you may not be grabbing big air anytime soon – but you’ll get where you need to be, fast.
